content: 44 x 44 finished size supplies needed 72 6-inch squares of fabric 36 for the front and 36 for the back 36 6-inch squares of batting 300 grams of fingering weight yarn i used 6 skeins of bernat baby in antique white other supplies sewing machine thread large eyed needle crochet hook supplies for blocking squares large piece of cardboard or foam board spray bottle pins
